posts.content:
Outstanding condition following professional full rebuild. 3 owners from new, German import, completely original. LHD. 30K refurbishment included new chassis ribs, floor pan, front panels, full bare metal re-spray, fuel system, gearbox, Aluminium pop out windows at rear, head lining, interior refit, re-upholstered, new seals all round, new audio, tyres, undersealed. All receipts and work logs from The Camper Van Company provided. Less than 250 miles since 2013 rebuild. Sails through MOTs, due October. Never rented. This trustworthy and much loved van reluctantly sold to good home.

Van located in East Northamptonshire.
